description: Describes a simple network address translation policy for IP Addresses and/or Ports.
title: Network address translation policy

id.description: Globally unique identifier for translation policy

translation_scope.description: Indicates where the policy is applied

level.description: Indicates the level at which the policy is applied

device_id.description: Globally unique identifier of the network device. This property is required if level is 'network_device' or 'network_device_interface', but must not be included if level is 'root'.

port_id.description: The port identifier of the network device's interface. This property is required if level is 'network_device_interface', but must not be included if level is 'root' or 'network_device'.
